hops.message: REST endpoint /v1/messaging/conversations GET method implemented as get_my_conversations
Conversation model with proper relationships to User and Message
ConversationParticipant model for tracking user participation
Frontend uses mock conversations data, no API integration
Component consumes conversations from WebSocket context only
Websocket router properly registered in FastAPI app
Tests exist but focus on WebSocket connections, not REST API conversations endpoint

defects.msg: Frontend uses hardcoded mock data instead of calling backend API endpoint /v1/messaging/conversations
Symbol naming 'websocket_get_my_conversations_GET' is misleading - this is a REST API endpoint, not a WebSocket operation
Frontend attempts WebSocket connection to undefined API URL in initializeMockData fallback
SQL query lacks pagination optimizations and may be slow with large datasets
No specific tests for get_my_conversations REST endpoint functionality
